tool.name: Isobaric ratio normalization

param.name: psmtable
param.label: Search table from MSGF+
param.help: Must contain quant information and protein groups

param.name: mzidnormalize
param.label: Optional second PSM table to generate the medians from

param.name: isobpattern
param.label: Pattern for isobaric quant columns in PSM table
param.help: Regex to find quant columns, e.g. tmt10plex, itraq8plex, plex

param.name: denominators
param.label: Isobaric protein quantification denominator regex patterns

tool.help: Takes a multifile TSV table with MSGF+ data and collapses it into one file. Headers of the individual files are checked to make sure they are identical, which should be implicit in multifile datasets.
